home.title: hey, Andrew here
home.description: hi there, I'm a software engineer who builds for the web with a design-oriented approach.

about.title: about
about.subtitle: a glimpse into me
about.description1: Hi, I'm Andrew, born in Novosibirsk, Russia, and I moved to Kazan for my studies. I used to be a professional hockey player. I have been coding for {years} years. As a software engineer, I specialize in full-stack web development.
about.description2: When I'm not at my desk, I am probably lifting weights, playing soccer or hockey, filming something interesting.

work.title: work
work.description: I specialize in React, web development, UI/UX. But I am always learning new things. Here are some of the places I have worked.

education.title: education
education.description: I am currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Information Technology and Computer Science. My goal is to continue my education and personal development in this field, constantly striving to enhance my skills and knowledge.

gear.title: gear
gear.subtitle: my toolbox
gear.description: this is all gear I actually own and like. Updated on June 2024
